title: LoL Client is broken
body:
So whenever I try to play a game, I get this error http://imgur.com/a/VZSf9 
I have everything updated and I can run other games fine but not league
I restarted my computer many times and then my client puts be back on a older installation of LoL and makes me full repair my client

replies.body: We've been seeing a few reports on this, mostly from players using a recent AMD graphics driver causing this. [ Rolling back to a previous driver ](http://support.amd.com/en-us/download/desktop/previous?os=Windows%2010%20-%2064)has served as a workaround in the meantime.  Otherwise, my suggestion here would be to run through the steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to rule out possibilities with drivers, game files, and even hardware.  Test it out in a custom game and let me know if that works for you.

Sorry to poke in here, but just trying to find anything - have you seen anything that helps for people with NVIDIA graphics cards? I posted a support ticket but haven't heard anything yet (I understand it takes time).
